question: Bryophytes commonly grow in moist, ______ areas in the hills.
Bryophytes are also called ______ of the plant kingdom.
Bryophytes can live in soil but depend on ______ for sexual reproduction.
Bryophytes are dependent on water for ______ reproduction.
Bryophytes usually occur in ______, humid and shaded localities.
Bryophytes usually occur in damp, ______ and shaded localities.
Bryophytes play an important role in plant ______.
Bryophytes grow in moist shaded areas in the ______.
Bryophytes grow commonly on bare ______ or soil.
Because of their dependency on water, bryophytes are known as ______ of the plant kingdom.
Plant succession on bare rocks/soil is facilitated by ______.
